posts.post_title: T206 Ty Cobb red portrait SGC 2.5 Polar Bear - SOLD

Really nice looking red Cobb.  Clean image. Plus Polar Bear back.  SOLD

Card is really cool! It’s missing some ink on the scrolls on the back
